item.title: This Week on Xbox: May 13, 2016
item.description:
This Week on Xbox: May 13, 2016

This special edition of This Week on Xbox features the announcement of Battlefield 1, the release of Doom and the Halo 5: Guardians update Memories of Reach, and more!

item.title: Official Call of Duty®: Black Ops III - Eclipse Multiplayer Trailer
item.description:
Official Call of Duty®: Black Ops III - Eclipse Multiplayer Trailer

Eclipse, the second DLC map pack for Call of Duty®: Black Ops III, arrives on XBox One on May 19, delivering four new action-packed Multiplayer maps, including the re-imagining of the Call of Duty: World at War classic, Banzai.

item.title: Unlocked Frame Rate and More Now Enabled for UWP
item.description:
Unlocked Frame Rate and More Now Enabled for UWP

What an exciting few months it's been for Windows 10 Gamers In the last few months, we've taken Windows 10 gaming to a new level by partnering with Microsoft Studios to deliver marquee titles such as: Gears of War: Ultimate Edition, Rise of the Tomb Raider, Quantum Break, and Forza Motorsport 6: Apex (Beta), all of...

item.title: ID@Xbox Game Fest week 2 is live now: "Play for Free"
item.description:
ID@Xbox Game Fest week 2 is live now: "Play for Free"

ID@Xbox "Game Fest" will be spotlighting great games from ID@Xbox throughout the entire month of May. In week 2, check out some of the best games from Independent Developers you can play for free right now.

item.title: Xbox at E3 2016
item.description:
Xbox at E3 2016

It's that time of the year again: E3 is just a few weeks away! That means now is the perfect time to start sharing some of our plans for one of the gaming industry's biggest annual events. Today, we're excited to announce that the Xbox E3 2016 Briefing will take place Monday, June 13, beginning at 9:30 a.m.

item.title: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six Siege - Operation Dust Line Trailer
item.description:
Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six Siege - Operation Dust Line Trailer

Operation Dust Line is here, bringing 2 new NAVY SEAL Operators: Valkyrie and Blackbeard! The all new Border map, set in the Middle East, is now available to all Rainbow Six Siege players. Season Pass holders get instant access to Blackbeard and Valkyrie on May 11.

item.title: Dangerous Golf - Coming soon to Xbox One
item.description:
Dangerous Golf - Coming soon to Xbox One

An arcade style sports game with a very explosive twist. Play through a variety of Indoor Courses - make a mess in the Kitchen, wreak havoc in a Palace, or cause chaos in a Castle and set fire to a Gas Station. Rack up scores by causing as much damage and destruction as possible.

item.title: It's the big 4.0 - Happy Birthday Minecraft: Xbox Edition!
item.description:
It's the big 4.0 - Happy Birthday Minecraft: Xbox Edition!

Hello! It's hard to believe it's been four years since Minecraft arrived on Xbox consoles, and we've enjoyed every minute of it. We all know birthdays call for a celebration and we want to make sure that you can dress up for the occasion, so starting today through May 16 you'll be able to download the 4th Birthday Skin Pack for Minecraft: Xbox 360 Edition and Minecraft: Xbox One Edition for free.

item.title: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt - Blood and Wine (teaser trailer)
item.description:
The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt - Blood and Wine (teaser trailer)

"THE LAND OF WINE IS DRENCHED IN BLOOD" For the last time become professional monster slayer Geralt of Rivia and explore Toussaint, a remote land untouched by war, where you will unravel the horrifying secret behind a beast terrorizing the kingdom. Blood and Wine is a 20+ hour adventure full of dark deeds, unexpected twists, romance and deceit.

item.title: This Week's Deals With Gold And Spotlight Sale
item.description:
This Week's Deals With Gold And Spotlight Sale

Here are this week's games and add-on deals on the Xbox Games Store. Discounts are valid now through 16 May 2016.
